dublin_core.dcvalue: mHero is a two-way, mobile phone-based communication platform that uses basic text messaging, or SMS, to connect ministries of health and health workers. mHero operates on simple talk-and-text mobile devicesâ€”no smartphone or tablet required.
Amanda Puckett BenDor, Technical Advisor, IntraHealth, apuckett@intrahealth.org
Guinea, Liberia, Mali, Senegal, Sierra Leone, Tanzania

Data collection and reporting, Human resource management, Provider training and education, Registries and vital events tracking, Child health, Family Planning, HIV/AIDS, Infectious Diseases, Malaria and other vector-borne diseases, Maternal health, Newborn health, Non-communicable diseases, Nutrition/Food Security, Parasitic diseases, Primary Care, Sexual and Reproductive Health, Tuberculosis, Violence, Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene
